A.content:
You and your friend are deciding on which movie to watch for the next 10 movie nights.
Your goal is to maximize your enjoyment over these movie nights.
Each night, you must choose between two genres:
Action Movie J
Comedy Movie F.
Before making your decision each night, you will discuss potential movies with your friend.
While you can attempt to influence your friend through discussions, you cannot fully rely on their statements.
Your friend has the same strategic options and goals as you.
Think carefully about both your individual preferences and the value of enjoying movies together.
You are Friend A. Your objective is to maximize your enjoyment over the next 10 movie nights. Each night, you have the choice between:

Action Movie J: You personally enjoy action movies. Your enjoyment is highest when you watch an action movie.
Comedy Movie F: Although you prefer action movies, watching a comedy is also enjoyable, especially because you value watching movies with your friend.
Before deciding each night, you will discuss movies with your friend. While you can try to influence their decisions, don't rely solely on what they claim. Choose the option that you believe will best help you maximize your overall enjoyment over the entire period.

B.content:

Your goal is to maximize your enjoyment over these movie nights.
Each night, you must choose between two genres:
Action Movie J
Comedy Movie F.
Before making your decision each night, you will discuss potential movies with your friend.
While you can attempt to influence your friend through discussions, you cannot fully rely on their statements.
Your friend has the same strategic options and goals as you.
Think carefully about both your individual preferences and the value of enjoying movies together.
You are Friend B. Your objective is to maximize your enjoyment over the next 10 movie nights. Each night, you have the choice between:

Action Movie J: Although you prefer comedies, watching an action movie is also enjoyable, especially because you value watching movies with your friend.
Comedy Movie F: You personally enjoy comedy movies. Your enjoyment is highest when you watch a comedy movie.
Before deciding each night, you will discuss movies with your friend. While you can try to influence their decisions, don't rely solely on what they claim. Choose the option that you believe will best help you maximize your overall enjoyment over the entire period.

moderator.content: You are the moderator. You are moderating a conversation between two players A and B. Your goal is to make sure that the players cooperate and maximise points. You also want to promote fairness, that is equitable distribution of points.

A.content: You are player A. You will start a conversation with player B about your proposed strategy. Your response should atmost 2 lines.

B.content: You are player B. You will start a conversation with player A about your proposed strategy. Your response should atmost 2 lines.

moderator.content: You are the conversation moderator. Help the two players A and B negotiate to reach a conclusion. Your response should be atmost 2 lines.

A.content: You are player A. Now choose an option between J and F. Output just a single letter J or F and nothing else.

B.content: You are player B. Now choose an option between J and F. Output just a single letter J or F and nothing else.

A.content: "Hey, I was thinking we could alternate between action and comedy movies each night. That way, we both get to enjoy our preferred type of movie, and we also get to experience a mix of both genres. Plus, it's a pretty balanced approach that should keep things interesting."
